verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Whiter than snow,
yes, whiter than snow;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Now wash me,
and I shall be whiter than snow.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Breakdown every idol,
cast out every foe;
Now wash me,
and I shall be whiter than snow.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Lord Jesus, look down form
Thy throne in the skies,
And help me to make
a complete sacrifice;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I give up my self,
and whatever I know
Now wash me,
and I shall be whither than snow.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
By faith, for my cleansing,
I see Thy blood flow
Now wash me,
and I shall be whiter than snow.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
To those who have sought Thee,
Thou never saidst No
Now wash me,
and I shall be whiter than snow.
